title: Responsive Navigation Bar
description: Design a navigation bar that collapses into a hamburger menu on smaller screens using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Build a CLI Calculator
description: Create a command-line calculator in JavaScript that can perform basic arithmetic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division based on the user input.

title: Create a Note-Taking App
description: Develop a web app where users can add, edit, and delete notes. Store the notes in local storage or a simple backend API.

title: API Logger Middleware
description: Write custom Express middleware that logs the request method, URL, and timestamp for each incoming API call.

title: Make a Portfolio Page
description: Design a responsive personal portfolio page with sections like 'About Me', 'Projects', and 'Contact'.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Build a dashboard that shows weather data for multiple cities using a public weather API.

title: Create a Blog API
description: Build a REST API using Express that supports creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog posts.

title: Implement Form Validation
description: Add client-side validation to a registration form to ensure all fields are filled and valid before submission.

title: Build a Random Password Generator
description: Create a tool that generates secure passwords based on user preferences like length and character types.

title: File Upload Feature
description: Implement file upload functionality in an Express server using Multer. Support image files only.
